BBEX3.M.LRD.EUR.CA.AB.A01: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Liberia  / EUR 1 = LRD ... (selling)
General: From December 2000 to December 2005, we have just information about middle rates for the US dollar and calculated comparable rates for the euro.
Source: Central Bank of Liberia, Monrovia

Methodology: The comparable rates were calculated on the basis of the month-end rates for the US dollar in Liberia in conjunction with the respective euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
Comment on 2012-04: Calculated using exchange rate on 1 May 2012.
